column1: "I (Ella) want to start a new project called 'Scandinavian Pottery Workshop Series'. The goal is to host monthly workshops to teach Scandinavian pottery techniques. Due date: 2024-01-15. Priority: High."
"On 2023-10-02, I (Ella) need to sketch some new pottery designs for the workshop series."
"On 2023-10-04, I (Ella) will visit the local art supply store to buy clay and tools for the workshop."
"On 2023-10-10 at 10:00 AM, I (Ella) have a meeting with my son Erik at our pottery store in Minneapolis to discuss workshop logistics."
"Every Monday (Ella), I (Ella) will spend 2 hours practicing pottery techniques to stay sharp."
"On 2023-10-10 at 2:00 PM, I (Ella) will visit the Swedish Cultural Center in Minneapolis to promote the workshop series."
"I (Ella) need to prepare a presentation for the workshop series by 2023-10-20."
"On 2023-10-08, I (Ella) will email the Swedish diaspora community in Minneapolis to invite them to the workshops."
"On 2023-10-12 at 3:00 PM, I (Ella) have an appointment with Dr. Lindstrom at the Minneapolis Neurology Clinic."
"I (Ella) met with Erik on 2023-10-10 at the pottery store. We finalized the workshop schedule and materials needed."
"On 2023-10-12, I (Ella) will create a flyer for the workshop series and share it with the art community."
"I (Ella) attended my appointment with Dr. Lindstrom on 2023-10-12. We discussed my progress and strategies to manage my condition."
"On 2023-10-15 at 11:00 AM, I (Ella) will host a small pottery demonstration at the Swedish Cultural Center."
"On 2023-10-14, I (Ella) will practice the techniques I (Ella) plan to teach in the first workshop."
"The pottery demonstration at the Swedish Cultural Center went well! Many people expressed interest in the workshops."
"I (Ella) need to finalize the list of attendees for the first workshop by 2023-10-25."
"On 2023-10-18, I (Ella) will meet with my son Lars to discuss the financial aspects of the workshop series."
"On 2023-10-20 at 1:00 PM, I (Ella) will review the workshop presentation with Erik at the pottery store."
"On 2023-10-19, I (Ella) will prepare the clay and tools for the first workshop."
"I reviewed the workshop presentation with Erik on 2023-10-20. He gave some great feedback."
"On 2023-10-22 at 10:00 AM, I (Ella) will visit the local library to research more Scandinavian pottery designs."
"I found some inspiring designs at the library on 2023-10-22. I (Ella) will incorporate them into the workshop."
"On 2023-10-24, I (Ella) will send reminders to all attendees for the first workshop."
"On 2023-10-24, I (Ella) will set up the pottery studio for the first workshop."
"I finalized the attendee list on 2023-10-25. We have 15 participants for the first workshop!"
"On 2023-10-28 at 9:00 AM, I (Ella) will host the first Scandinavian Pottery Workshop at the pottery store."
"On 2023-10-27, I (Ella) will double-check all materials and tools for the workshop."
"The first workshop was a success! Everyone enjoyed learning the techniques."
"On 2023-10-30, I (Ella) will write thank-you notes to all participants and gather feedback."
"On 2023-10-30, I (Ella) will plan the next workshop in the series, scheduled for 2023-11-15."
